description:
3 Mile Bend Recreational Area is a designated off-leash dog park. The route 
tracked is almost the perimeter of the park, with a few other trails connected 
between the route.
directions:
From 67 St in Red Deer, follow Riverside drive North until you see the sign 
indicating the park on your right hand side. Follow the road around and take 
your pick of any number of parking areas.
title: 3 Mile Bend
